Monthly Creative Technology Meetups in Huddersfield

archive

Thursday 7th September 2023

17.30 – 19.30

Free entry, drinks and snacks provided, come meet other artists/creatives/technologists in a friendly, casual environment.

This month’s meetup will include a presentation and demonstration from from sound artist, musician, and technician Joe Christman discussing their approaches to generating ambient soundscapes using granular processing.

Where?

Dai 大 Hall (The Piazza, Unit 29/30, Victoria Lane, Huddersfield HD1 2QF)
